name: Hope's Last Breath
effect: Heal model within 1 inch for D6 HP. Doesn't work on Downed/Dead

name: Will of the Optimistic
effect: Target adds extra D6 to next test

name: Not Dead Yet
effect: Dead model awakens with 1 HP and additional Flaw

name: Shield of the Faithless
effect: Model cannot be targeted by ranged attacks for one round

name: Shadow Bind
effect: Target cannot move for D3 rounds

name: Curse of Weakness
effect: Target suffers -2 to all Stats for remainder of Scenario

name: Blood Boil
effect: Target makes Toughness test or takes 1D8 damage ignoring Armor

name: Fear
effect: All enemies within 6 inches must make Morale test
